name: Pumpkin Patch
description: With two stands held together giving you a marled look throughout, you can mix the colors and create your own unique pumpkin patch. Pattern uses one Fall Festival Bundle with 2 strands held together throughout.
full_text: With two stands held together giving you a marled look throughout, you can mix the colors and create your own unique pumpkin patch. Pattern uses one Fall Festival Bundle with 2 strands held together throughout. EXPERIENCE LEVEL: Advanced Beginner MATERIALS Woolstok (Worsted) Bundle (100% Fine Highland Wool, 21 mini hanks: 5g/12 yd each): 1 bundle (Fall Festival) Size 8 (5mm) double point needles, or size needed to obtain gauge Stitch marker Stuffing Tapestry needle FINISHED MEASUREMENTS Circumference: 11½ (13½)“ after stuffing Height: 2½“ after cinching COLORS SHOWN Fall Festival Bundle
